data.name: The Lewd Knight
data.detailed_description:
Genre: Sandbox, Adventure, Card Battles

This is a game about a girl who just wants to forever clear her city of crime. To do this, she will have to go a long way from *mad cosplayer*, chasing dirty perverts out of the park, to the real super hero fighting against evil.

Unfortunately, her father did not leave her a billion-dollar company, so she would have to be a hero, working as an office secretary at the same time, or earning money in some other way...

Of course, you will help her in all this.

You will have to help her in the battle against crime...



In battles against overweight...



And help her in relationships with her colleagues.



Features:

  • Girl-superhero management sim with RPG and tycoon elements
  • Hilarious storyline where you will see the backstory of the main heroine
  • Card battles with the crime!
  • Train your hero!
  • Awesome arts

data.short_description: Help the girl - a superhero in the fight against evil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core2DUO 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain some nude scenes
